SEARCH
Package com.example.cab302project.controllers

Class CalenderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.cab302project.controllers.CalenderController
public class CalenderController extends Object
Controller class for managing the main calendar view in the application. Handles calendar rendering for day, week, month, and year views, user interface interaction, and navigation between pages.

    • CalenderController

      public CalenderController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the calendar view, UI elements, and sets default values. Also binds event listeners and loads session user.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - of session user is null

    • onMonthYearSelected

      private void onMonthYearSelected()
      Handles updates when the month or year is changed via ComboBoxes. Updates the current date and re-renders the calendar.

    • onYearView

      private void onYearView()
      Sets the view to the Year layout and updates visibility accordingly.

    • onMonthView

      private void onMonthView()
      Sets the view to the Month layout and updates visibility accordingly.

    • onWeekView

      private void onWeekView()
      Sets the view to the Week layout and updates visibility accordingly.

    • onDayView

      private void onDayView()
      Sets the view to the Day layout and updates visibility accordingly. Also updates the current date.

    • onLogoHover

      private void onLogoHover()
      Enlarges the logo on mouse hover.

    • onLogoExit

      private void onLogoExit()
      Resets logo scale on mouse exit.

    • openSettingsPage

      private void openSettingsPage()
      Opens the settings page and closes the current window.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the FXML file cannot be loaded or displayed.

    • openFriendsPage

      private void openFriendsPage()
      Opens the friends page and closes the current calendar window.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the FXML file cannot be loaded or displayed.

    • handleLogOut

      private void handleLogOut()
      Opens the user profile page and closes the current calendar view.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the FXML file cannot be loaded.

    • openProfilePage

      private void openProfilePage()

    • updateCalendar

      private void updateCalendar()
      Updates the calendar based on the currently selected view (Day/Week/Month/Year).

    • renderMonthView

      private void renderMonthView()
      Renders the month view in the calendar UI. This method populates the `monthGrid` with header labels and daily cells, including date numbers and any associated events. It also highlights the current day.

    • renderWeekView

      private void renderWeekView()
      Renders the week view in the calendar UI. Displays a grid with hour labels on the left and seven days of the week, showing events that occur within each hourly time slot.

    • renderDayView

      private void renderDayView()
      Renders the day view in the calendar UI. Displays a timeline of 24 hours and populates the timeline based on event times.

    • renderYearView

      private void renderYearView()
      Renders a full year view using multiple mini-month grids in the calendar UI. Current day is highlighted

    • renderMiniDayView

      private void renderMiniDayView()
      Renders a mini sidebar view showing hourly slots for the current day. Displays 24 rows from 00:00 to 23:00 with time labels and empty event labels. This is used to give a quick glance at the day's structure.

    • updateDayComboBox

      private void updateDayComboBox()
      Updates the dayComboBox based on selected month and year.
